title: Simple Kind to Skin Sensitive Bath Soak, Pack of 12, Bubblebath for Women, Ultra-Gentle Hypoallergenic Product Designed for The Most Sensitive Skin, 1L
features: ABOUT SIMPLE: Simple is the UK’s leading Beauty brand offering a range of superior cleansing and moisturising products which are gentle yet effective for even the most sensitive skin. Simple products contain no artificial perfume, colour or harsh chemicals using instead only the purest possible ingredients which leave skin looking and feeling clean, fresh and instantly hydrated. Simple has been a trusted skincare brand for over 50 years in the UK.

SENSITIVE BATH SOAK: Treat your delicate skin to the ultimate care with Simple Kind to Skin Sensitive Bath Soak. Thoughtfully designed for the most sensitive skin types, this mild, soap-free formula gently cleanses without irritation. It creates a soft, soothing foam that turns your bath into a comforting, skin-kind soak-perfect for everyday self-care. Whether it’s post-gym relaxation or evening wind-down, enjoy a bath that leaves your skin feeling clean, calm and protected.

VITAMIN B5 & VITAMIN E: This sensitive skin bath soak is enriched with skin-loving pro-vitamin B5 and vitamin E — two ingredients known to deeply soothe and hydrate irritated skin. Free from artificial perfumes, colourants, and harsh chemicals, it’s dermatologically tested to be kind to your skin. Ideal for those in the looking for a gentle, everyday bath solution that restores moisture and supports the skin’s natural barrier.

SKIN FRIENDLY FORMULA: This dermatologically tested bath soak is free from soap, artificial colours, and harsh ingredients that can upset delicate skin. Ideal for the whole family, it’s a skin-kind alternative for those looking for gentle, pH-balanced, and irritation-free cleansing.

VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE: Made with love for your skin and the planet, this vegan-friendly bath soak contains no animal-derived ingredients and comes in recyclable packaging. Join thousands of shoppers who are choosing sustainable, clean beauty with Simple’s trusted formulas.
description: Product description Simple Kind to Skin Sensitive Bath Soak, Pack of 12, Bubble Bath for Women, Ultra-Gentle Hypoallergenic Bath Product Designed for The Most Sensitive Skin, 1L Safety Warning For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes
